The Okareka Classic: Rotorua weekend of golf that’s lasted 50 years and counting https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/the-okareka-classic-rotorua-weekend-of-golf-thats-lasted-50-years-and-counting/LWHV45JBRFC5PBI6YOLMG5N3II/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/the-okareka-classic-rotorua-weekend-of-golf-thats-lasted-50-years-and-counting/LWHV45JBRFC5PBI6YOLMG5N3II/ Kaitlyn MorrellA 1974 fun lads' golf trip is now an annual tradition titled the 'Okareka Classic'. Sat, 02 Nov 2024 18:00:00 +0000 The golfing friends (pictured here in 1987) have been playing in their annual "Okareka Classic" since 1974.

New Hawke’s Bay clinic to improve access to cancer diagnosis and treatment in region https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/clinic-to-improve-access-to-cancer-diagnosis-and-treatment-in-hawkes-bay/ZLCC3JKDJVAJLOFD6ALTEMACKQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/clinic-to-improve-access-to-cancer-diagnosis-and-treatment-in-hawkes-bay/ZLCC3JKDJVAJLOFD6ALTEMACKQ/ Doug Laing'This clinic marks a transformative moment for the Hawke’s Bay region.' Sat, 02 Nov 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Clinical lead Prue Lamerton, a specialist with over 40 years’ experience, with the new molecular imaging machinery in Hastings, bringing diagnosis and assessment to Hawke's Bay that otherwise might have had to be done in distant major cities. Photo / Supplied
